works.description: One particular website has copied entire pages from my website. I have been creating free in-depth Korean lessons and posting them on my "How to study Korean" website since late May/Early June. Today I noticed that entire pages (very long lessons) have been 100% copied and pasted onto another website. So much so, that when you click on the links within the fake website, you are directed to my website (i.e. the page it was copied from).
